nodes.text: The Yllotat system was a star system located within the Bothan sector of the Mid Rim. Darth Vader waged a campaign against the Bothan spy network responsible for leaking information about the second Death Star to the Rebel Alliance in this system.
Yllotat is an anagram for the word "totally". When combined with the system name from the previous TIE Fighter campaign ("Semag"), the company name Totally Games can be rendered.
